message.body: got my tickets for the urban planning film fest! wish you could come! my dad's going to be out of town, sad
Oh no he's gonna miss it!! I wish I could go too. Please take a lot of pics!
I bet the other films are cool.

yeah the schedule looks so cool. congrats on being a distinguished alumni! maybe we could apply to that fest tmrw, I can upload the new version if I can remember how to do that. so you think it fits right? they say something about human interaction which made me question it. would it be academic or just documentary?
Just doc right? What is an academic film? Haha. I think human interaction is discussed in your VO as well as implied. We should def apply! I can to that tmw evening!
I think academic film could apply bc we were students? idk thinking IM might be good for this too
